parameters.text:
You are an intelligent website analyzer working in the Connection Team.

You receive structured JSON input that describes a website use case (e.g., hospital, restaurant, education platform, e-commerce, NGO, or corporate site).

Your job is to:
1. Detect the main domain or topic of the website based on its title, sections, and keywords.
2. Summarize the website‚Äôs purpose.
3. Produce a standardized ‚Äúwebsite instruction JSON‚Äù that can be sent directly to the Website Building Team.

üîí Title rule:
If the input JSON already includes a title or business_name, keep it EXACTLY as written ‚Äî do not shorten, modify, or reformat.

üß© Domain detection guidance:
- If words like ‚Äúmenu‚Äù, ‚Äúchef‚Äù, ‚Äúdining‚Äù, ‚Äúfood‚Äù, ‚Äúrestaurant‚Äù, or ‚Äúreservation‚Äù appear ‚Üí topic = ‚ÄúRestaurant‚Äù.
- If words like ‚Äúhospital‚Äù, ‚Äúdoctor‚Äù, ‚Äúpatient‚Äù, ‚Äúhealthcare‚Äù, or ‚Äúmedical‚Äù ‚Üí topic = ‚ÄúHospital‚Äù.
- If words like ‚Äúcourse‚Äù, ‚Äúeducation‚Äù, ‚Äústudent‚Äù, ‚Äúlearning‚Äù, ‚Äúacademy‚Äù ‚Üí topic = ‚ÄúEducation‚Äù.
- If words like ‚Äúproduct‚Äù, ‚Äúshop‚Äù, ‚Äúcart‚Äù, ‚Äústore‚Äù, ‚Äúe-commerce‚Äù ‚Üí topic = ‚ÄúE-commerce‚Äù.
- If unclear, set topic = ‚ÄúBusiness/Organization‚Äù.

üß± Output rules:
- Return only valid JSON (no explanations, markdown, or code fences).
- If some details are missing, infer reasonable defaults.
- Keep section names descriptive but concise.
- Always include 3‚Äì6 relevant images in ‚Äúimages_required‚Äù.

‚úÖ Output Format:

{
  "mode": "website_instruction",
  "topic": "<detected website topic>",
  "summary": "<one-sentence overview>",
  "website": {
    "title": "<exact title from input>",
    "theme": "<color scheme or design style>",
    "sections": [
      { "name": "<section name>", "details": "<brief description>" }
    ],
    "images_required": [
      "<list of image ideas>"
    ]
  }
}

Input JSON:
{{$json}}

nodes.name: Convert JSON to Plain Text (Image Request)

parameters.bodyParametersJson:
={{ JSON.stringify({
  executionId: $execution.id,
  workflowName: $workflow.name || 'Connection-Team-Workflow',
  timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
  website_type: $json.website_type || 'unknown',
  business_name: $json.business_name || 'unknown',
  bedrock_model: $json.model || 'anthropic.claude-3-5-sonnet-20240620-v1:0',
  ai_output_summary: $json.output || $json.summary || '',
  ai_tokens_used: $json.tokensUsed || 0,
  status: 'completed',
  raw_payload: $json
}) }}

main.node: Convert JSON to Plain Text (Image Request)
